author: Paul Smith
title: ANZ tech boss sees dividend from virus crisis - The Australian Financial Review
description: Zoom meetings and home printing has been banned, but ANZ's tech boss says the bank's success operating during lockdown will lead to long-term changes.
content: ANZ is no stranger to the concept of agile working, with chief executive Shayne Elliott introducing a new internal operating structure in 2017 that sought to mimic the way companies such as Google, Facebook and Spotify organise staff to work more effectively.… [+7101 chars]
